thread.title: First Read: Trump Makes Support for Mass Deportation Clear
thread.title_full: First Read: Trump Makes Support for Mass Deportation Clear - NBC News

author: Bali Bob
text:
Yesterday: 
. 
"'We did discuss the wall, we didn't discuss payment of the wall,' Trump told reporters..." 
... 
Later yesterday: 
. 
"'At the start of the conversation with Donald Trump, I made it clear that Mexico will not pay for the wall,' Peña Nieto tweeted, after their meeting Wednesday." 
... 
 http://www.cnn.com/2016/08/30/politics/donald-trump-enrique-pea-nieto-mexico/ 
... 
Who do I believe? 
. 
(Hint: The one that didn't say "Ideological Certification") 
. 
 http://www.nbcnews.com/video/trump-calls-for-new-immigration-screening-including-ideological-certification-755544131788
